channel.title: [508] Problems
channel.description:
Almost finished with my server, I decided to test some things. Everything works except for pking and dying. Because, there's no attack option, and on death, you get white-screened, and you can't login anymore.
Same thing with castlewars, you go up a ladder, and get whitescreened.
I have to delete character files for them to be able to login again.
Please Help me?

item.title: [508] Problems
item.dc:creator: @hussain123 hussain123
item.description:
@hussain123 wrote:

Each problem goes to different directions, I’m happy coding for you, allthough, you may need to download
Teamviewer, or send file on .bat or Yahoo.

Some people think, they can compile stuff right, but like 2 days later, nothing’s been coded properly.

People think they can hack over’s files.
and not be able to make their own.

Well… Private Message me, Or add my yahoo messenger

Tester100230@yahoo.com

Well, dude… I think you chose the right section at the right timing plus, the right oference

keep it going mate.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Problems
item.dc:creator: @zachwizzy zachwizzy
item.description:
@zachwizzy wrote:

You probably deleted a critical code in the server or client code or the code/source is too messy to begin with. I would reccomend getting a better 508 source just to avoid the difficulties that you are having with your 508. Rarely I stumble across good 508 sources soo good luck with that

Tip: 317’s are easier to work with instead of 508’s

508’s have code that is almost impossible to work with, unless you get a decent source. I found that rubik’s scape 508 is a good source to edit and add items/commands.

Happy coding

Read full topic
